actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow individuals a deduction for social security and railroad retirement taxes.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an income tax deduction for: (1) social security taxes paid by employees; (2) social security taxes paid by self-employed individuals; and (3) tier 1 railroad retirement taxes on employees and employee representatives. Treats such deduction as an income tax deduction attributable to a trade or business.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow individuals a deduction for social security and railroad retirement taxes.
